replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
配置文件写错了
"mrq"前面多了一个空格
修改之后的文件
https://c-t.work/s/c3c86cbcac1b4a
ip_forward: true
network_compression_threshold: 256
stats: 987a3e9c-8855-4bbd-96b4-09ef102e3911
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
groups:
  upan05:
  - admin
servers:
  login:
    motd: 'yyyy~~~~~~~'
    address: localhost:20000
    restricted: false
  ldq:
    motd: 'qwq'
    address: localhost:26199
    restricted: false
  kdq:
    motd: 'AWA'
    address: localhost:26250
    restricted: false
  mrq:
    motd: 'XD'
    address: localhost:23333
    restricted: false
timeout: 30000
listeners:
- query_port: 12340
  motd: 'qwq'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts: {}
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - login
  - login
  - login
  - login
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:12340
  max_players: 500
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
prevent_proxy_connections: false
player_limit: -1
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- help
connection_throttle: 4000

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wjwrh 于 2020-6-3 15:29 编辑 
u盘05 发表于 2020-6-3 15:27
哦哦，可以了，再问最后一个qwq。。ViaVersion-2.2.3用这个插件可以让1.7和1.12进同一个登录服吗 ...
得看你的登录服版本
如果是1.12的话需要安装viabackwards才能让1.7进来


安装这两个到1.12的服务器
就可以让1.9-1.15的玩家都可以进1.12的登录服

replies.author: u盘05
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
